Uses of Package
com.opengamma.strata.report.framework.format

  • Packages that use com.opengamma.strata.report.framework.format 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.report.cashflow
    Types for reporting and formatting cashflows.
    com.opengamma.strata.report.framework.format
    Provide the ability to format calculated values.
    com.opengamma.strata.report.trade
    Types for reporting and formatting trades.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.report.framework.format used by com.opengamma.strata.report.cashflow 
    Class and Description
    ReportFormatter
    Common base class for formatting reports into ASCII tables or CSV format.
    ReportOutputFormat
    Enumerates the report output formats.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.report.framework.format used by com.opengamma.strata.report.framework.format 
    Class and Description
    FormatCategory
    Defines categories of data types.
    FormatSettings
    Contains formatting settings for a specific type.
    FormatSettings.Meta
    The meta-bean for FormatSettings.
    FormatSettingsProvider
    Provides and caches format settings across types.
    ReportOutputFormat
    Enumerates the report output formats.
    ValueFormatter
    Formats a value into a string.
